video.title: SvelteKit Crash Course Follow Up - Deploy Your Project to Production
video.description:
Follow up video for the SvelteKit Crash Course!

Deploy your project to Netlify and Vercel without GitHub, then push the project to GitHub and deploy via code changes and Pull Requests.

Source code on GitHub: https://github.com/spences10/sparkles-blog

Full Crash Course here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zH2qG9YwN3s

00:00 - Intro
00:58 - Adapters documentation
01:52 - Configure Adapter Static
02:21 - Build Static project
03:21 - Deploy project to Netlify without git
04:58 - Deploy to Vercel without git
05:29 - Vercel CLI
08:23 - Push project to GitHub
10:00 - Connect Vercel Project to GitHub project
10:26 - Deploy project to Vercel with GitHub
13:50 - Change Vercel project domain name
14:18 - Configure adapter static to deploy to Netlify
15:40 - Deploy to Netlify with GitHub
19:05 - Change Netlify project domain name
20:10 - Using hybrid (Vercel node) and jamstack
tags: how to make a sveltekit app
